Display Controller API
VPS Driver API

Modules

 BSP_DRV_IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL

Data Structures

struct  Vps_DctrlEnumNode
 Structure containing the properties of a the processing node. Node represents a VPS module which controls how and which display goes to perticulcar VENC. This structure is for enumerating this processing modules one by one and get the properties of it. More...
 
struct  Vps_DctrlEdgeInfo
 Structure containing edge information. Edge is a connection between two nodes i.e. two modules (like CIG and Blend) in VPS. VPS can be represented by a graph, where each module is node and edge is present between two nodes if they are connected. All VPS paths can be configured in one shot by IOCTL IOCTL_VPSCORE_DCTRL_SET_CONFIG. This IOCTL takes the array of edges connected between nodes. This structure is used to specify individual edge information. More...
 
struct  Vps_DctrlOutputInfo
 Structure containing output information. This structure is used to set output in the output node. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_VPSCORE_DCTRL_SET_VENC_OUTPUT ioctl. More...
 
struct  Vps_DctrlVencDivisorInfo
 Structure containing Venc Divisor information for the LCDx overlays(LCD1,LCD2,LCD3) . DISPC_LCDx_PCLK = (LCDx_CLK/ divisorLCD) / divisorPCD. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_VPSCORE_DCTRL_SET_VENC_PCLK_DIVISORS ioctl. More...
 
struct  Vps_DctrlModeInfo
 Structure containing mode information. More...
 
struct  Vps_DctrlVencInfo
 Structure containing venc information. This structure is used is IOCTL_VPSCORE_DCTRL_SET_CONFIG API to configure mode in the Vencs. It also is used to inform which vencs are tied. Two vencs are tied when both are running on the same pixel clock and vsync signal for both the vencs are synchronized. If two vencs are tied, they will be enabled at the same time in order to have both synchronized. Note that if each of tied venc is configured with the different modes, display controller does not check whether venc synchronization is possible or not with the given modes. More...
 
struct  Vps_DctrlConfig
 Structure contaning set of edges and VENC information. Here, edge represents connection between two VPS modules. When an edge is enabled, output from a VPS modules is connected as an input to another VPS module. This structure is used in IOCTL_VPSCORE_DCTRL_SET_CONFIG API to configure Complete VPS connections statically in one shot. It has set of edges, which describes how individual modules are connected to each other and finally to the VENC. It also configures the mode in the VENCs and tells which vencs are tied.Tied Vencs are not supported in DSS. More...
 
struct  Vps_DctrlSDVencVideoStandard
 Structure containing Video standard information for SD-VENC This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_VPSCORE_DCTRL_SET_SDVENC_MODE ioctl. More...
 
struct  Vps_DctrlErrorSyncLostStats
 Structure containing the sync lost error counts This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_VPSCORE_DCTRL_GET_ERROR_STATS ioctl. More...

Enumerations

enum  Vps_DctrlUseCase { VPS_DCTRL_DUALHDDISPLAY = 0, VPS_DCTRL_USERSETTINGS, VPS_DCTRL_NUM_USECASE }
 Enum for selecting VPS configuration for the specific use case or user defined use case. Display Controller supports few pre-defined configurations. Pre-defined configurations configures all vps modules, including vencs, handled by display controller. Once a pre-defined configuration is used, all other parameters will be ignored in the Vps_DcConfig structure and display controller will be configured as per the pre-defined configuration. More...
 
enum  Vps_DctrlNodeType {
  VPS_DCTRL_NODETYPE_MUX = 0, VPS_DCTRL_NODETYPE_DEMUX, VPS_DCTRL_NODETYPE_SPLITTER, VPS_DCTRL_NODETYPE_COMP,
  VPS_DCTRL_NODETYPE_INPUT, VPS_DCTRL_NODETYPE_OUTPUT, VPS_DCTRL_NODETYPE_MAX
}
 Enum defining node types available in VPS. There are several modules available in VPS, which controls how and which display goes to perticulcar VENC. These path controller modules are Multiplexers, DeMultiplexers, splitters, overlays(compositer/blender). There modules are known as nodes in the display controller. This enum defines the type of the node. More...

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum Vps_DctrlAnalogFmt

Analog Format.

enum Vps_DctrlAnalogFmt

Enumerator
VPS_DCTRL_A_OUTPUT_COMPOSITE 

Analog output format composite

VPS_DCTRL_A_OUTPUT_SVIDEO 

Analog output format svideo

VPS_DCTRL_A_OUTPUT_COMPONENT 

Analog output format component

VPS_DCTRL_A_OUTPUT_MAX 

This should be the last Enum

enum Vps_DctrlDigitalFmt

DVO Format, BT656 and BT1120 are two different type of embedded sync formats supported by the VPS module. It supportes Discrete sync format as well.

enum Vps_DctrlDigitalFmt

Enumerator
VPS_DCTRL_DVOFMT_BT656_EMBSYNC 

Output data format is BT656 with embedded sync

VPS_DCTRL_DVOFMT_BT1120_EMBSYNC 

Ouptut data format is BT1120 with embedded sync

VPS_DCTRL_DVOFMT_GENERIC_DISCSYNC 

Output data format is for any discrete sync

VPS_DCTRL_DVOFMT_MAX 

This should be the last Enum

enum Vps_DctrlDispcMode

DISPC Mode.

Enumerator
VPS_DCTRL_DISPC_MODE_SLAVE 

Display Controller Mode Slave

VPS_DCTRL_DISPC_MODE_MASTER 

Display Controller Mode Master

VPS_DCTRL_DISPC_MODE_MAX 

Display Controller Mode Max

enum Vps_DctrlNodeType

Enum defining node types available in VPS. There are several modules available in VPS, which controls how and which display goes to perticulcar VENC. These path controller modules are Multiplexers, DeMultiplexers, splitters, overlays(compositer/blender). There modules are known as nodes in the display controller. This enum defines the type of the node.

enum Vps_DctrlNodeType

Enumerator
VPS_DCTRL_NODETYPE_MUX 

Multiplexer or Switch, takes N selectable inputs and provides one output

VPS_DCTRL_NODETYPE_DEMUX 

DeMultiplexer, takes one input and outputs on N selectable outputs.

VPS_DCTRL_NODETYPE_SPLITTER 

Splitter, takes one input and provides M identical outputs

VPS_DCTRL_NODETYPE_COMP 

Compositor, takes N inputs and provides one composited output

VPS_DCTRL_NODETYPE_INPUT 

Input Node, there is no node connected as input to this node

VPS_DCTRL_NODETYPE_OUTPUT 

Output Node, there is no node connected as output from this node

VPS_DCTRL_NODETYPE_MAX 

This must be last enum

enum Vps_DctrlSignalPolarity

Signal polarity.

Enumerator
VPS_DCTRL_POLARITY_ACT_LOW 

Signal polarity Active high

VPS_DCTRL_POLARITY_ACT_HIGH 

Signal polarity Active low

VPS_DCTRL_POLARITY_MAX 

Signal polarity Max value

enum Vps_DctrlUseCase

Enum for selecting VPS configuration for the specific use case or user defined use case. Display Controller supports few pre-defined configurations. Pre-defined configurations configures all vps modules, including vencs, handled by display controller. Once a pre-defined configuration is used, all other parameters will be ignored in the Vps_DcConfig structure and display controller will be configured as per the pre-defined configuration.

enum Vps_DctrlUseCase

Enumerator
VPS_DCTRL_DUALHDDISPLAY 

DUALDISPLAY configuration: Pre-defined configuration in which HDMI and DPI are used to provide two HD outputs. Both the VENCs are running 1080p mode at 60 fps.

VPS_DCTRL_USERSETTINGS 

User Defined configuration

VPS_DCTRL_NUM_USECASE 

This must be the last Enum
